author: funnygiulio
content: btw can we post this on the ethereum website? or at least some more decent website? I do not think the vast majority of people will read a random hackmd - I think this is important and should be pushed to people's faces (especially RPC providers) to at least review

author: pipermerriam
content: I'll see about getting a more external facing write up of this posted somewhere appropriate for such things

author: funnygiulio
content: yeah - I think this deserve a spot on the Ethereum blog. I think we need to warn people ahead of time properly
